mainTask.title: HT-036: HT-035 Integration & System Unification - Dashboard Integration, Conflict Resolution & Production Readiness
mainTask.description:
CRITICAL POST-HT-035 INTEGRATION TASK: Resolve all identified conflicts, redundancies, and integration gaps from HT-035 implementation. Transform the agency toolkit from fragmented systems into a unified, production-ready platform with seamless user experience and zero conflicts.

**Mission:** Complete the final 25% of HT-035 integration by resolving all system conflicts, integrating dashboards, unifying data models, and ensuring seamless user experience across all toolkit features. Achieve 100% production readiness with comprehensive testing and documentation.

**Scope:** Dashboard integration, automation system consolidation, module management unification, webhook system integration, template marketplace connection, data model harmonization, comprehensive testing, and production deployment preparation.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with systematic conflict resolution, progressive integration testing, and comprehensive validation of all integrated systems.

**Business Impact:**
- Achieve 100% HT-035 integration and production readiness
- Eliminate all system conflicts and redundancies
- Provide unified user experience across all toolkit features
- Complete PRD compliance with integrated systems
- Enable seamless workflow from orchestration to handover
- Support full $2k-8k pricing model with integrated capabilities
- Achieve 95%+ user satisfaction with unified interface
- Enable scalable operations with consolidated systems

performance_targets.dashboard_load_time: <2 seconds for main agency toolkit page

identified_conflicts.automation_orchestration: CONFLICT - Existing /agency-toolkit/automation vs HT-035 orchestration layer
identified_conflicts.webhook_systems: OVERLAP - Generic webhook handler vs n8n-specific webhook integration
identified_conflicts.module_management: REDUNDANCY - Basic module enable/disable vs comprehensive hot-pluggable system
identified_conflicts.template_systems: INTEGRATION_NEEDED - Existing template engine vs marketplace template management
identified_conflicts.dashboard_access: CRITICAL - HT-035 pages not integrated into main agency toolkit dashboard

integration_requirements.dashboard_integration: Add 4 HT-035 module cards to main agency toolkit dashboard
integration_requirements.conflict_resolution: Replace conflicting automation page with HT-035 orchestration
integration_requirements.data_model_unification: Merge client_app_overrides with HT-035 module registry
integration_requirements.webhook_consolidation: Use existing webhook infrastructure as HT-035 foundation
integration_requirements.template_marketplace: Connect HT-035 marketplace with existing template engine
integration_requirements.user_experience: Seamless navigation between all toolkit features

dependencies: HT-035.4.3 completion (Walkthrough Video & Interactive Tutorial Automation)
HT-035.4.4 completion (Admin Access, Credentials & Complete Package Assembly)
Existing automation page (app/agency-toolkit/automation/page.tsx) - TO BE REPLACED
Existing webhook system (lib/webhooks) - TO BE INTEGRATED
Existing module system (lib/modules) - TO BE EXTENDED
Existing template engine (lib/template-engine) - TO BE CONNECTED
Database schema (client_app_overrides table) - TO BE UNIFIED

success_metrics.integration_completeness: 100% HT-035 functionality accessible from main dashboard
success_metrics.conflict_elimination: Zero duplicate or conflicting functionality across systems
success_metrics.user_experience: Single, unified interface for all agency toolkit features
success_metrics.production_readiness: 100% PRD compliance with integrated and tested systems
success_metrics.performance: All performance targets met across integrated systems
success_metrics.documentation: Complete user guides and technical documentation for unified system
success_metrics.testing_coverage: 95%+ test coverage for all integration points
success_metrics.deployment_success: Seamless production deployment with zero downtime

subtasks.title: HT-036.1: Dashboard Integration & Navigation Unification
subtasks.description: AUDIT: Integrate all HT-035 pages into the main agency toolkit dashboard and create unified navigation experience for seamless user workflow.

actions.title: HT-036.1.1: Main Dashboard Integration Analysis & Design
actions.description: Analyze current agency toolkit dashboard structure and design integration approach for all HT-035 modules with unified navigation and user experience
pages_to_create: docs/integration/dashboard-integration-analysis.md - Complete analysis of dashboard integration requirements
docs/integration/user-experience-flow.md - Complete user experience flow documentation
verification_checkpoints: Current dashboard structure fully analyzed and documented ✓
Integration approach designed for all 4 HT-035 modules ✓
Unified navigation patterns specified ✓
User experience flow mapped from dashboard to all features ✓
Module grid component designed for optimal UX ✓
Integration requirements documented and validated ✓

Real-time status indicators working for all modules

Cards follow existing design system and user preferences
All icons and descriptions accurately represent functionality

subtasks.title: HT-036.3: Data Model Unification & System Integration

actions.title: HT-036.3.1: Database Schema Unification & Migration Design

success_criteria.integration_completeness: 100% HT-035 functionality accessible from unified interface
success_criteria.conflict_elimination: Zero duplicate or conflicting functionality across all systems
success_criteria.user_experience: Seamless navigation and workflow across all agency toolkit features
success_criteria.production_readiness: 100% PRD compliance with integrated, tested, and documented systems
success_criteria.performance_targets: All performance targets met across integrated systems
success_criteria.documentation_completeness: Comprehensive documentation and training materials for all users
success_criteria.testing_coverage: 95%+ test coverage for all integration points and workflows
success_criteria.deployment_success: Seamless production deployment with monitoring and alerting

technical_risks: Complex system integration may introduce unforeseen compatibility issues
Data migration may encounter edge cases not covered in testing
Performance optimization may require significant architectural changes
Integration testing may reveal critical issues requiring major refactoring
mitigation_strategies: Comprehensive staging environment testing before production deployment
Incremental integration approach with rollback capabilities at each phase
Extensive data migration testing with comprehensive backup procedures
Performance monitoring and optimization throughout integration process
User acceptance testing with real workflows before final deployment
business_risks: Extended integration timeline may delay business value realization
User disruption during migration may impact productivity
Integration complexity may require additional resources
business_mitigations: Phased rollout minimizing user disruption during integration
Comprehensive training and support during transition period
Clear communication of business value and improved capabilities
Dedicated support team during integration and initial production period
